Comment 1: 
I can't reproduce this on my machine; even after adding delays to various internal
mechanisms.

The indexer does re-check the status of the file system scan every one minute, so in
theory, it should kick in later again if the file system wasn't scanned at first and
later gets an update. I don't see an obvious error in the logic (cursory check).

Is this reproducible for you? Machine details?
